trans-unit.source: An enumeration listing the possible types of X.509 key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: 一个列出 X.509 密钥标识符子句可能的类型的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.X509SecurityTokenParameters.X509ReferenceStyle%2A> property to a member of this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.X509SecurityTokenParameters.X509ReferenceStyle%2A> 属性设置为此枚举的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.X509KeyIdentifierClauseType.SubjectKeyIdentifier" /> is used if present in the X.509 certificate, otherwise <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.X509KeyIdentifierClauseType.IssuerSerial" /> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 X.509 证书中存在 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.X509KeyIdentifierClauseType.SubjectKeyIdentifier" />，则使用它；否则使用 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.X509KeyIdentifierClauseType.IssuerSerial" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="IssuerSerial" /> reference is used: the issuer identifier plus a serial number that is unique for an issuer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="IssuerSerial" /> 引用：颁发者标识符加上对颁发者唯一的序列号。

trans-unit.source: The reference contains the raw data for the entire X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 该引用包含整个 X.509 证书的原始数据。

trans-unit.source: Reference is based on the subject key identifier extension of an X.509 certificate (not all certificates have one, it is an optional property).
trans-unit.target: 引用基于 X.509 证书的主题密钥标识符扩展（并非所有证书都具有扩展，它是可选属性）。
